information: The company GERHARD OFF GMBH, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1974, which operates in the Indoor and greenhouse plants, floristry industry. It also operates in the Raw materials for construction and public works, Structural work, Finishing work, and Public works contractors industries. It is based in Fellbach, Germany.
